content.raw:
I’m going to update the documentation to reflect this feature’s existence as well, but as a quick response:

The ACK response is a protobuf message defined here: [#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184/add-in-scoring-acknowledgment/diff#Lsubt\_ign/src/protobuf/artifact.protoT41](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184/add-in-scoring-acknowledgment/diff#Lsubt_ign/src/protobuf/artifact.protoT41)

There is a test exercising scoring and validating the response as well here: [#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184/add-in-scoring-acknowledgment/diff#chg-subt\_ign/test/score.cc](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184/add-in-scoring-acknowledgment/diff#chg-subt_ign/test/score.cc)

I’m going to update the documentation to reflect this feature’s existence as well, but as a quick response:

The ACK response is a protobuf message defined here: #!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184/add-in-scoring-acknowledgment/diff#Lsubt_ign/src/protobuf/artifact.protoT41

There is a test exercising scoring and validating the response as well here: #!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/184/add-in-scoring-acknowledgment/diff#chg-subt_ign/test/score.cc
